thread.title: Jordan Rodgers and Jojo Fletcher Had the Most Romantic Vacation
thread.title_full: Jordan Rodgers and Jojo Fletcher Had the Most Romantic Vacation

author: Johnny Brayson
title: Jordan Rodgers and Jojo Fletcher Had the Most Romantic Vacation
text:
Happy Valentine's Day 
Before heading to the Caribbean, the engaged couple celebrated the romantic holiday in Punta del Este, Uruguay. 
"That day she was, this day she is, and every day forward -- my best friend. I love you @joelle_fletcher," Jordan captioned the sweet pic on Instagram. Happy Valentine's Day Advertisement 
Before heading to the Caribbean, the engaged couple celebrated the romantic holiday in Punta del Este, Uruguay. 
"That day she was, this day she is, and every day forward -- my best friend. I love you @joelle_fletcher," Jordan captioned the sweet pic on Instagram. That View Jojo took to Snapchat to show off the breathtaking view from where the couple was staying on Necker Island. That View Advertisement 
Jojo took to Snapchat to show off the breathtaking view from where the couple was staying on Necker Island. Don't Feed The Wildlife 
The Bachelorette stars monkeyed around with some lemurs during their stay in paradise. Don't Feed The Wildlife 
The Bachelorette stars monkeyed around with some lemurs during their stay in paradise. Simply Stunning Hoping to inspire envy, 28-year-old Jordan captioned this vista on Instagram, "View this." Simply Stunning 
Hoping to inspire envy, 28-year-old Jordan captioned this vista on Instagram, "View this." Out For A Stroll The pair certainly looked TV-ready as they flaunted their fit figures on the white sands of the beach. Out For A Stroll Advertisement 
The pair certainly looked TV-ready as they flaunted their fit figures on the white sands of the beach. Bed Time To prove they didn't spend their entire vacation outdoors, Jojo, 26, also shared a video of her and her fiancé in bed together. Oh Jojo, you shouldn't have! Bed Time Advertisement 
To prove they didn't spend their entire vacation outdoors, Jojo, 26, also shared a video of her and her fiancé in bed together. Oh Jojo, you shouldn't have! Grabbing A Handful 
Not to be outdone when it comes to risqué photos, Jordan shared this photo to Instagram of him and his future bride getting frisky by the shore. "Can(and I)did," he captioned the sexy pic. Grabbing A Handful Advertisement 
Not to be outdone when it comes to risqué photos, Jordan shared this photo to Instagram of him and his future bride getting frisky by the shore. "Can(and I)did," he captioned the sexy pic. NEXT Advertisement 
Jojo Fletcher and Jordan Rodgers continued their exotic holiday over the weekend by heading to the Virgin Islands after spending Valentine's Day in Uruguay. 
Click through the gallery to see all the gorgeous, romantic, and sexy pics from the lovebirds' vacation!
